summary: Keep only reads that contains a tag with value that agrees with parameters

arguments.summary: Look for this tag in read
arguments.name: --read-filter-tag

arguments.summary: Compare value in tag to this value
arguments.name: --read-filter-tag-comp

arguments.summary: Compare value in tag to value with this operator. If T is the value in the tag, OP is the operation provided, and V is the value in read-filter-tag, then the read will pass the filter iff T OP V is true.
arguments.name: --read-filter-tag-op

description: Keep only reads that contain a tag with a value that agrees with parameters as specified.
name: ReadTagValueFilter
